items.title: Slay the Spire 2 launches in Early Access on March 5, 2026
items.summary: Mega Crit confirmed the Early Access date and shared the official trailer. The post also reiterates 4-player co-op and continued content updates during Early Access.

items.title: Steam listing shows March 2026 release window and core Early Access details
items.summary: The Steam app page lists Slay the Spire 2 as coming in March 2026 and highlights Early Access scope, including planned content growth and co-op support up to 4 players.

items.title: r/slaythespire trailer thread gained strong engagement
items.summary: The subreddit thread for the Early Access trailer is highly active (1.6K+ upvotes in search snippet), indicating sustained community attention around the March 5 launch date.

items.title: IGN coverage highlights co-op reveal and Steam blog details
items.summary: IGN reports the March 5, 2026 Early Access date and emphasizes the newly revealed 4-player co-op mode with multiplayer-specific cards and synergies.

highlights: Mega Crit officially set Slay the Spire 2 Early Access for March 5, 2026.
Steam store page continues to show March 2026 timing with Early Access + 4-player co-op positioning.
Community and press coverage remain focused on the date/trailer/co-op reveal; no newer official post found after Feb 19 in fetched sources.
